articles.author: Shawn Pogatchnik
articles.title: Supreme Court: Northern Ireland’s Brexit trade rules are legal - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The comprehensive judgment from the UK’s constitutional arbiter caps two years of unionist efforts to topple the trade protocol through the courts.
articles.content:
The Supreme Court has comprehensively dismissed an appeal by Northern Ireland unionist lawmakers to have the U.K. regions post-Brexit trade rules declared unconstitutional.
In an eight-minute oral j… [+2592 chars]
